item.title: Demographics (1/2): Russia’s Shrinking Population
item.description: Looking ahead to 2060 and 2100 in By 2060, this country will have the world’s largest population (World Economic Forum) and These will be the 10 largest countries by population in 2100 (Business Insider, 2019) – though an article on Russia’s demographics should naturally begin with the past.
